user_query: I'm planning a family vacation to a beach destination. Can you suggest some popular beach resorts with family-friendly amenities? Additionally, I would like to know about any water sports activities available in the area.

TaskList.description: Research popular beach resorts that offer family-friendly amenities.
Compile a list of family-friendly amenities available at each resort found in step 1.
Investigate water sports activities available in the destination area.
Provide a summary of popular water sports activities related to the resorts from step 1.
